title: What is the Tillamook logo type?
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130817033852im_/http:/typophile.com/files/TillamookLogoType_5568.jpg)

I'm wondering what the typeface is for the Tillamook logo. Is it even a typeface at all? I can't find anything that matches the a or the k. A lot of typefaces get close, but none close enough. Any ideas? Help!
author: mynameisfrench

comments.content:
It must be **[Plantin Condensed (Bold)](http://web.archive.org/web/20130817033852/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Adobe&ffam=Plantin%20Condensed%20-%20Bold&fid=27a3ccec4540910d75fcecf41ccef110&fsize=60&text=Tillamook&fit=1)** by Frank Hinman Pierpont (1991, available from Adobe, Monotype, Linotype)  
It looks manually emboldened and the /k is probably a bit customized.

------------------  
I found it using "Find my Font": [http://www.findmyfont.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20130817033852/http:/www.findmyfont.com/ "http://www.findmyfont.com")
